title: Delta Force 2
description:
This is the unpatched ground breaking orginal Delta Force 2 uploaded by me and not by anyone else.

"You're a member of the U.S. Army's best-kept SECRET: the elite SPECIAL OPERATIONS unit KNOWN AS DELTA FORCE- formed to battle terrorism throughout the world. You've been called into action, CAN YOU handle the JOB?"

"TERRORIZE                 "APPROACH                        "BATTLE
THE TERRORISTS            THE OBJECTIVE                  YOUR WAY thorugh 
  with new                via land, sea or                 40 missons and
weapons, equipment,          air - use                     challenging new
   fixed machine                tall grass,              multiplayer games" 
gun and grenade-          water and rolling  
 launcher emplacements"      terrain to move undetected"  

         "CREATE YOUR OWN single or multiplayer
               battles with the new Mission Editor"

         "Take charge with the NEW COMMANDER'S SCREEN
       direct your teammates in single and multiplayer action"

"...AN ABSOLUTE BLAST..."      "IT WILL KEEP YOU ON THE   "ADDICTIVE, TEMPTING
         PC Gamer               EDGE OF YOUR SEAT..."     AND OVERPOWERING..."
                                      GameSpot                   Avault.com

Instructions on how to setup Delta Force 2 In No Time:

1. First go to http://www.daemon-tools.cc/ then click download then look for Daemon Tools Lite v 4.30.4 then click download.

2. Once you have finished downloading the torrent, go to the folder of the torrent then mount the DELTAFORCE2.mds file. (By opeining up Daemon Tools Lite and then you should see a icon on the the lower right coner then you would right click it then click Virtual CD/DVD-ROM then click on your divce then click mount image and then it should come up with a Select image file tab or screen then browse for the DELTAFORCE2.mds file then then you hilight the DELTAFORCE2.mds file by clicking on it and then click open.)

3. As soon that is done an autorun menu should apear and you should know what to do from then on there.

>>If you already have Daemon Tools Lite then you can skip step one.
  System Requirements are in the README file and the bonus stuff like Misson Editor is in the DELTAFORCE2.mds file.   
 
* I included the CD-Key in the torrent because you have to enter it while you are in the setup.

Mulitplayer doesn't work because novaworld doesn't support it anymore so just enjoy the game and have fun fragging.

Please rate on this torrent and ask for help if needed.
